title: Anil Neerukonda Institute of Technology & Sciences: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement

basic_info.name: Anil Neerukonda Institute of Technology and Sciences Hostel
description: College has separate hostel for boys and girls. Boys hostel can accommodate 92 boys and girls hostel can accommodate 135 girls.

Section.name: About ANITS
Section.description:
Anil Neerukonda Institute of Technology and Sciences was established in 2001 by Dr. N. B. R. Prashad in the memory of his son Anil Neerukonda.
ANITS, AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 for General Category is listed below. The overall cutoff rank for AP EAPCET is 6335 - 110928.
College has good placements records. This year also college has witness some of the best placement records. This year highest package is of Rs. 2 Crores given by Google.
